import React from"react";import"../../styles/Cards.css";//add props to display the cards dynamically....
function Cards(props){var style={divStyle:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(props.image,")")}};return React.createElement("div",{onClick:function onClick(){return props.cardStatus(props.id);},role:"img","aria-label":"click item",className:"click-item shake",style:style.divStyle});}export default Cards;
